meanings.definition: Give permission or approval for (an action or project)
meanings.sent1: The teacher greenlighted the field trip for the students.
meanings.sent2: The committee greenlighted the new construction project.
meanings.sent3: The principal greenlighted the idea of a pajama day at school.
meanings.sent4: The city council greenlighted the plan to revitalize the downtown area.
meanings.sent5: The manager greenlighted the proposal to implement flexible work hours.

meanings.definition: Approve or authorize (a project or action)
meanings.sent1: The board greenlighted the budget for the upcoming year.
meanings.sent2: The studio greenlighted the production of the new movie.
meanings.sent3: The parents greenlighted the idea of a petting zoo at the school fair.
meanings.sent4: The government greenlighted the initiative to reduce carbon emissions.
meanings.sent5: The team greenlighted the plan to launch a new product line.
